comments.body: When'll the tests be enabled? Should we change this to something like if GV == v1 then don't run the test, in case that we have batch/v2beta1 in the future

Sort of yes, but I'm afraid it might run with other versions in that case. Having explicit GV set to batch/v2alpha1 is our best option as of now. Hopefully in the future it'll be much better with handling multiple groups.
